personal_info.summary: I am a proactive professional with solid experience in administrative tasks and customer service within the retail industry. My background has equipped me with strong organizational skills, teamwork, and the ability to multitask effectively under pressure. With a strong foundation in handling data through tools like Excel and knowledge of programming languages such as Java and Python, I am eager to contribute to improving processes and identifying innovative solutions in data management.

responsibilities: Raised the sales by 50% in comparison with previous months by creating Excel spreadsheets to manage daily cash flow for every individual employee.
Streamlined the use of week to week documentation ensuring the smooth acquisition of goods to sell on a daily basis. Raising the efficiency of the commerce by 20%.
Collaborated on teams to create batches of modular furniture under pressure within 30 day strict deadlines to send to international buyers.
Interpreted technical blueprints and worked on-site with pre-welded structures accomplishing production requirements 35% faster than expected.
